A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: WISH IT WAS BETTER!#\nI was very excited to see this (who wasn't/isn't) and while there were bits of this that were the best of Star Wars\, there was so so so so many forced\, clunky\, lazy\, virtually breaking the 3rd wall with the knowing humor schtick gags that it was almost totally ruined for me. A shame\, such a shame. Let's hope there's time to re-think Rian Johnson taking the helm for a raft more installments- Go see it\, do but best to go in with low expectations.
